CustomField.formula: IF( FLOOR(Hours_Logged__c) > 0, TEXT(FLOOR(Hours_Logged__c)) & " hour" & IF(FLOOR(Hours_Logged__c) > 1, "s", "") & IF(ROUND(MOD(Hours_Logged__c * 60, 60), 0) > 0, " and ", ""), "" ) & IF( ROUND(MOD(Hours_Logged__c * 60, 60), 0) > 0, TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Hours_Logged__c * 60, 60), 0)) & " minute" & IF(ROUND(MOD(Hours_Logged__c * 60, 60), 0) > 1, "s", ""), IF(FLOOR(Hours_Logged__c) = 0, "0 minutes", "") )
CustomField.label: Time Display
